 2016-02122016-04-06,  ,  ,  PMO, 
ActPublic Service Employment Act
PrecisAppointment of the HONOURABLE WILLIAM C. GRAHAM, P.C., C.M., Q.C., of Toronto, Ontario, as a special adviser to the Minister of National Defence, to serve as Chairperson of the Advisory Panel to the Minister of National Defence on Defence Policy Review, to hold office during pleasure, on a part-time basis, for a term expiring January 31, 2017.
